summary: This document appears to be an internal incident report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding a procedural error in logging for a staff suicide watch. The wrong logbook was used initially, and a second log was completed with the correct form. The entries in both logs are noted as identical.

persons.name: DTS
persons.role: Staff member who discovered the log error
persons.context: Discovered that the wrong logbook was used for a staff suicide watch and initiated correction.

persons.name: Associate Warden MCC New York
persons.context: The report is addressed to or involves the Associate Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

connections.description: Both are staff members at MCC New York involved in correcting a procedural log error.

events.title: Logbook Error for Staff Suicide Watch
events.description: A staff suicide watch was assigned, but the wrong logbook (I/M companion log) was used instead of the proper Staff Suicide Watch log. The error was discovered by DTS, and a second, correct log was completed with identical entries, initialed by M.

keyFacts: A procedural error occurred at MCC New York where the wrong logbook was used to document a staff suicide watch.
The error was discovered by a staff member identified as DTS.
A second, correct log (Suicide Watch log) was completed with entries identical to the first, and it was initialed by a staff member identified as M.
The document is marked CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files related to Epstein.
